name: Castle of the Damned
description: After the armies of mankind cleansed the evil places of the world, evil had to find a new home. The defeated dark creatures gathered in one last bastion, The Castle of the Damned. Cramped and squabbling they lick their wounds. Wise kings rest their armies, not willing to open that Pandora's box, but unknown to them a new force is consolidating its power. Brave adventurers venture to the Castle of the Damned to test their might and plunder from the horded treasures hidden there.
